contact.text: Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. Postal: 130 Holger Way San Jose, CA 95134 E-mail: support@Brocade.com Web: www.brocade.com

configd:help.text: Number of NS messages to send while performing DAD
Configure parameters for sending Router Advertisements (RAs)
Value to place in "Retrans Timer" field in RAs.
Value of link MTU to place in RAs
Minimum interval between unsolicited multicast RAs
Default router is low preference
Default router is medium preference (Default)
Default router is high preference
Default router preference
IPv6 prefix to be advertised in Router Advertisements (RAs)
IPv6 prefix to be advertised in Router Advertisements (RAs)
Flag that prefix can be used for on-link determination
Time in seconds that the prefix will remain preferred
Whether prefix can be used for address auto-configuration
Time in seconds that the prefix will remain valid
Value to be placed in the "Current Hop Limit" field in RAs
Maximum interval between unsolicited multicast RAs
Value for "managed address configuration" flag in RAs
Enable/disable sending RAs
Value to be placed in "Router Lifetime" field in RAs

error-message.value: Value must be between 0 and 3,600,000 milliseconds (1 hour)

configd:help.text: Value to be placed in "Reachable Time" field in RAs
Value to be placed in the "other configuration" flag in RAs
IPv6 address auto-configuration modes
Assign IPv6 address using EUI-64 based on MAC address
Enable acquisition of IPv6 address using stateless autoconfig
Disable IPv6 forwarding on this interface only
